org.happy.artist.rmdmia
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  org.happy.artist.rmdmia.Controller

public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

The Controller Object is the RMDMIA's implements dynamic access between RMDMIA Components (i.e. RCSM, ROCI).
